channel.title: Border Junction on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Border Junction on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-30 East at WY-89 - Border Junction
item.description: US-30 East at WY-89 at Border Junction. Turn left for WY-89 north to Afton and Jackson; continue straight for US-30/WY-89 South to Cokeville. WY-89 south joins US-30 east to Sage Junction.
